itunes:author: Gremlin
itunes:summary: In this episode we speak with Caroline Dickey, a Site Reliability Engineer at Mailchimp. Topics include: Having customer empathy, rolling out a Chaos Engineering program, and some of the Game Days that the Mailchimp team has conducted, including experiments on Kubernetes and etcd.
